movies.title: Blade Runner
movies.description: A dystopian sci-fi classic where a blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049
movies.description: A young blade runner's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

movies.title: Drive
movies.description: A mysterious Hollywood stuntman and mechanic moonlights as a getaway driver and finds himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love but struggle to maintain a relationship as they pursue their dreams in Los Angeles.
